logger.doc:name: Start Logger
logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "logger": "Start Logger Weather", "correlationId": vars.correlationId default "N/A", "transactionId": vars.transactionId default "N/A", "dateTime": now() as String { format: "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'" }, "flow": flow.name default "unknown-flow", "layer": "process" }]

ee:variables.ee:set-variable: { "latitude": payload.latitude, "longitude": payload.longitude, "start_date": vars.payload.dataInicio, "end_date": vars.payload.dataFim, "timezone": payload.timezone, "daily": "temperature_2m_max,temperature_2m_min,precipitation_sum" } filterObject (!isBlank($))

logger.doc:name: Error Logger
logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "logger": "Logger Error Request Notification", "errorDescription": error.description, "errorType": error.errorType, "httpStatus": error.attributes.statusCode default null, "correlationId": vars.correlationId default "N/A", "transactionId": vars.transactionId default "N/A", "dateTime": now() as String { format: "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'" }, "flow": flow.name default "unknown-flow", "layer": "process" }]

logger.doc:name: End Logger
logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "logger": "End Logger Weather", "correlationId": vars.correlationId default "N/A", "transactionId": vars.transactionId default "N/A", "dateTime": now() as String { format: "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'" }, "flow": flow.name default "unknown-flow", "layer": "process" }]
